Summary: Star-like objects, one of them at a lower than normal altitude from my previous sightings.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were 3 other sightings in Phoenix on or around April 17th 2008
divs: sighting detailsas usual i was outside on my break, looking at the sky. i was kind of disappointed because i didn't see anything the first few times i looked during my morning break, but as i was starting to walk back into the building a flash caught my eye and a definite saucer shaped ufo was right overhead moving very erratically. it was white in appearance but i was only able to watch it for a few seconds and then it zoomed away to the west over the building in the blink of an eye ! later on in the day, i was outside on my afternoon break and i spotted 1 ufo in the eastern part of the sky. one of my fellow employees who is also a good friend just happened to come outside at that moment and i grabbed him and said "see...see ! i told you that i have been seeing these ufo's !" i directed his attention to the one that i was watching when all of a sudden another one appeared almost right next to the one we were watching and it moved on past the hovering ufo and then stopped a short distance away from the first one. it was much brighter than the first one we were watching and was blinking randomly, either from the sun glinting off it's shell or from unseen lights. then the brighter of the 2 ufo's just blinked out of existence, leaving the other one just hovering in the sky. i just came back in from my last break of the day with my friend\fellow employee, and sure enough we just saw two more ufo's that just 'popped' into the sky sort of to the south from overhead. the one just sat there and hovered and the 2nd one moved away and then blinked out completely...not faded out, but bam ! gone. so that makes a total of 5 that my friend and i saw today. i did try to bring a camera with a telephoto lens to work, but it isn't working at the moment so i'll have to try and get a different camera to film these amazing things. at least now i have another witness that is seeing these craft and not just me....thank the gods...i still can't believe that i have been seeing so many of these craft over phoenix. why me? i have been advised to keep track of anything 'unusual' happening in my day-to-day life...for what, i have no idea but i must say that i am a bit nervous that someone said that to me. what could be more unusual than a ufo sighting on a daily basis ?! until tomorrow then...let's see what friday brings us. keep your eyes on the skies over phoenix my friends - something is happening and it's very exciting ! - john birmingham - phoenix, arizona
